title: What boards has turned into
body:
Basically boards has turned into a circle jerk of about 10 of these guys

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/29gQz60E-the-infamous-whitepumah-an-extended-interview

Quality posting everywhere.

replies.body: I dunno, I'm enjoying telling people they are twats and need to read red posts more often.
+1 I actually got a laugh out of this.
It's trash because all the good 'ol GDers died except for a few who still hang on.
